H0.text: what is the most famous building in rennes. Rennes City Hall

H1.text: what is the most famous building in rennes. Rennes Opera House

H2.text: what is the most famous building in rennes. Saint-Pierre Cathedral

H3.text: what is the most famous building in rennes. Parlement de Bretagne

A4.text: The last building to house the Parlement still stands and now houses the Rennes Court of Appeal.

A5.text: The Parlement building was restored following severe fire damage on February 5, 1994, an event linked to violent demonstrations by local fishermen.
